Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Tauro has already gone off to the
Zonai Ruins.<sp:0:4:0>If memory serves, he spoke of starting his
investigation around <clr:0000>Dracozu Lake<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I don't know his exact whereabouts, but
if you go <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>, you should find the
Zonai Ruins he volunteered to inspect.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That said...it's night now, and he hasn't
returned, which is worrying. Did he get
swept up in his work at the site?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Why must all our work be so taxing? Does no one
need an old hand at reviewing and cross-referencing
ancient documents?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_025: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I refer to the tall tower next to us.
Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Not now! Can't you see it's raining?
This is no time for a leisurely chat!
Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Excuse me, but you're standing in the
way of science. Talk to me once I get to
where I'm going, eh?
Talk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>It might not seem like much next to that
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>, I'll concede.
Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm very curious to know more about that
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>... <sp:5:1:0>Hm?
Talk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>It's you again. Did you manage to
meet up with <clr:0000>Tauro<clr:ffff>?
Talk_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>Not deterred by the rain, eh? Were
you able to meet up with <clr:0000>Tauro<clr:ffff>?
Talk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>Not deterred by the dark at this hour,
eh? Did you ever meet up with <clr:0000>Tauro<clr:ffff>?
Talk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Did you still need something?<sp:0:4:0>There's nothing I can tell you about the
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>, and I don't know <clr:0000>Tauro<clr:ffff>'s
whereabouts either.
Talk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice>Er...<sp:5:1:0>did you still need something from
me? I do have work here, you know.
Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ah, so you're here. Came to learn about
the Zonai from an expert, I gather?
Talk_018:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>And it doesn't help that I can't take my eyes off that
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>. It's almost too impressive.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice>Ah. <sp:5:1:0>Still here, eh? Did you need anything
else from me?
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I should welcome you to our humble base
of operations. Behold! This is where the
real investigation starts.
Talk_019:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>What, you're still looking for him? But
don't you know?
Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Going forward, our research will proceed
from here. <sp:5:0:0>Tauro has already gone off to
the Zonai Ruins.<sp:0:4:0>If memory serves, he spoke of starting his
investigation around <clr:0000>Dracozu Lake<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Go <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>and you should find the
Zonai Ruins he volunteered to inspect.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm curious if the "dragon land" written of
at the Ring Ruin will have any more leads
on the Demon King or Princess Zelda.<sp:0:4:0>Ordinarily, I'd be right there at his side in
the field, of course.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I'm worn out from setting up the base.
I'll need some time to recuperate before
I begin my own survey.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Goodness me, is there anything at all that slows
down Tauro?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Tauro has already gone off to the
Zonai Ruins.<sp:0:4:0>He spoke of starting his investigation
around <clr:0000>Dracozu Lake<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Go <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>and you should find the
Zonai Ruins he volunteered to inspect.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm curious if the "dragon land" written of
at the Ring Ruin will have any more leads
on the Demon King or Princess Zelda.<sp:0:4:0>Ordinarily, I'd be right there at his side in
the field, of course.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Setting up our base here was more tiring
than I expected. I still haven't recuperated
from the stress.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>I can't help but think about all the great discoveries
I'm missing out on. Ah, well...fieldwork never was
my strong suit, I suppose. *sigh*<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_020:
To be candid, I don't know its purpose.
But it makes an excellent landmark for
finding our base again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think><sp:0:2:2:5000>Though I wish it weren't so humbling to look at.
The base I set up seems so meager in comparison.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Eh? You've already met with Tauro?
And the two of you have begun to make
progress at the ruins?!<sp:0:4:0>*sigh* At least there's still the "dragon
land" mentioned at the Ring Ruin to
survey. I wish I could get a head start.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Perhaps once I've rested just a bit more.
I'll need to be at my best—I must bring
all my powers of observation to bear.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Ugh. I just know I'm missing out on so many
incredible discoveries. Ah, well...fieldwork never
was my strong suit, I suppose. *sigh*<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_021:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>What's that? <sp:5:0:0>This Skyview Tower doesn't
even work, you say?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0201>I don't know what you expect me to do
about it. <sp:5:0:0>Take it up with whoever built
the thing.<sp:0:4:0>Setting up this base was hard enough on
me without passersby expecting me to
play repairman.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:5000>I worked hard to build it, and yet next to the
Skyview Tower, it seems so...<sp:5:0:0>inadequate.<sp:0:4:0>Ugh, all this fretting is making me thirsty.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I'll
get some water from that well.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes, yes, you mentioned already that you
met up with Tauro and that you've made
a groundbreaking new discovery.<sp:0:4:0>*sigh* At least there's still the "dragon
land" mentioned at the Ring Ruin to
survey. I wish I could get a head start.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Perhaps once I've rested just a bit more.
I'll need to be at my best—I must bring
all my powers of observation to bear.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Ugh. I just know I'm missing out on so many
incredible discoveries. Ah, well...fieldwork never
was my strong suit, I suppose. *sigh*<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Going forward, our research will proceed
from here. <sp:5:0:0>Tauro has already gone off to
the Zonai Ruins.<sp:0:4:0>If memory serves, he spoke of starting his
investigation around <clr:0000>Dracozu Lake<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I don't know his exact whereabouts, but
if you go <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>, you should find the
Zonai Ruins he volunteered to inspect.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That said...it's night now and he hasn't
returned, which is worrying. Did he get
swept up in his work at the site?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>My goodness, the man is absolutely indefatigable.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. <sp:5:1:0>Maybe I shouldn't have set up our
base so close to it to begin with.
